message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand you think it's pricey, but I really believe you'll get a lot of value out of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $95.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting closer to a deal. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I can sell it to you for $92.
I'm getting close to accepting, but I think we can do better. I'm willing to pay $88 for the product.
I'm not willing to go much lower than this, but I'm willing to meet you at $90. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
